00326 inline Bead *Topology::CreateBead(byte_t symmetry, string name, BeadType *type, int resnr, double m, double q)
00327 {
00328     
00329     Bead *b = new Bead(this, _beads.size(), type, symmetry, name, resnr, m, q);    
00330     _beads.push_back(b);
00331     return b;
00332 }
00333 
00334 inline Molecule *Topology::CreateMolecule(string name)
00335 {
00336     Molecule *mol = new Molecule(this, _molecules.size(), name);
00337     _molecules.push_back(mol);
00338     return mol;
00339 }
00340 
00341 inline Residue *Topology::CreateResidue(string name)
00342 {
00343     Residue *res = new Residue(this, _molecules.size(), name);
00344     _residues.push_back(res);
00345     return res;
00346 }
00347 
00348 inline Molecule *Topology::MoleculeByIndex(int index)
00349 {
00350     return _molecules[index];
00351 }
